[Home](./index.md) &gt; [cdk-qwik-bundle](./cdk-qwik-bundle.md) &gt; [BundlingOptions](./cdk-qwik-bundle.bundlingoptions.md) &gt; [exclude](./cdk-qwik-bundle.bundlingoptions.exclude.md)

## BundlingOptions.exclude property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Path patterns of files excluded from hash computation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly exclude?: string[];
```

## Remarks

Build artifacts of a Qwik project are outputted to `dist` and `server` folders. The default value matches all the contents of these folders, and requires [ignoreMode](./cdk-qwik-bundle.bundlingoptions.ignoremode.md) to be [IgnoreMode.GIT](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.IgnoreMode.html#git)<!-- -->.
